verses.verse: The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> that which was evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> and Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years. <S%H8141><s%>

The hand <S%H3027><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> prevailed <S%H5810><s%> against Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and because <S%H6440><s%> of Midian <S%H4080><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> them the dens <S%H4492><s%> which are in the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> and the caves, <S%H4631><s%> and the strongholds. <S%H4679><s%>

So it was, <S%H3478><s%> when Israel had sown, <S%H2232><s%> that the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> came up, <S%H5927><s%> and the Amalekites, <S%H6002><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east; <S%H6924><s%> they came up against them; <S%H5927><s%>

and they encamped <S%H2583><s%> against them, <S%H7843><s%> and destroyed the increase <S%H2981><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> until you come <S%H935><s%> to Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> and left <S%H7604><s%> no sustenance <S%H4241><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> neither sheep, <S%H7716><s%> nor ox, <S%H7794><s%> nor donkey. <S%H2543><s%>

For they came up <S%H5927><s%> with their livestock <S%H4735><s%> and their tents; <S%H168><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> in as <S%H1767><s%> locusts <S%H697><s%> for multitude; <S%H7230><s%> both they and their camels <S%H1581><s%> were without number: <S%H4557><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> to destroy it. <S%H7843><s%>

Israel <S%H3478><s%> was brought very <S%H3966><s%> low <S%H1809><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of Midian; <S%H4080><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> to Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
It happened, <S%H1121><s%> when the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> cried <S%H2199><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> because <S%H182><s%> of Midian, <S%H4080><s%>

that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> a prophet <S%H376><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> and he said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H559><s%> "Thus says Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> <S%H5927><s%> 'I brought you up from Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and brought you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage; <S%H5650><s%>

and I delivered <S%H5337><s%> you out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Egyptians, <S%H4714><s%> and out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of all who oppressed <S%H3905><s%> you, <S%H1644><s%> and drove them out from before <S%H6440><s%> you, <S%H5414><s%> and gave you their land; <S%H776><s%>

and I said <S%H559><s%> to you, <S%H3068><s%> "I am Yahweh your God; <S%H430><s%> you shall not fear <S%H3372><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> in whose land <S%H776><s%> you dwell. <S%H3427><s%>" But you have not listened <S%H8085><s%> to my voice. <S%H6963><s%>'"

The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and sat <S%H3427><s%> under the oak <S%H424><s%> which was in Ophrah, <S%H6084><s%> that pertained to Joash <S%H3101><s%> the Abiezrite: <S%H33><s%> and his son <S%H1121><s%> Gideon <S%H1439><s%> was beating <S%H2251><s%> out wheat <S%H2406><s%> in the winepress, <S%H1660><s%> to hide <S%H5127><s%> it from <S%H6440><s%> the Midianites. <S%H4080><s%>
The angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> appeared <S%H7200><s%> to him, <S%H559><s%> and said to him, <S%H3068><s%> "Yahweh is with you, <S%H1368><s%> you mighty man of valor! <S%H2428><s%>"

Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H994><s%> "Oh, my lord, <S%H113><s%> if <S%H3426><s%> Yahweh <S%H113><s%> is with us, <S%H4672><s%> why then has all this happened to us? <S%H6381><s%> Where are all his wondrous works which our fathers <S%H1><s%> told <S%H5608><s%> us of, <S%H559><s%> saying, <S%H3068><s%> 'Didn't Yahweh bring us up <S%H5927><s%> from Egypt? <S%H4714><s%>' But now Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> has cast <S%H5203><s%> us off, <S%H5414><s%> and delivered us into the hand <S%H3709><s%> of Midian. <S%H4080><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> looked <S%H6437><s%> at him, <S%H559><s%> and said, "Go <S%H3212><s%> in this your might, <S%H3581><s%> and save <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> from the hand <S%H3709><s%> of Midian. <S%H4080><s%> Haven't <S%H7971><s%> I sent you?"

He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H994><s%> "O Lord, <S%H136><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> shall I save <S%H3467><s%> Israel? <S%H3478><s%> Behold, <S%H504><s%> my family is the poorest <S%H1800><s%> in Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> and I am the least <S%H6810><s%> in my father <S%H1><s%>'s house. <S%H1004><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H5221><s%> "Surely I will be with you, and you shall strike the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> man. <S%H376><s%>"

He said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H4672><s%> "If now I have found favor <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> then show <S%H6213><s%> me a sign <S%H226><s%> that it is you who talk with me. <S%H1696><s%>

Please don't <S%H4185><s%> go away, until I come <S%H935><s%> to you, <S%H3318><s%> and bring out my present, <S%H4503><s%> and lay <S%H3240><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> you. <S%H559><s%>" He said, "I will wait <S%H3427><s%> until you come back. <S%H7725><s%>"

Gideon <S%H1439><s%> went in, <S%H935><s%> and prepared <S%H6213><s%> a young goat, <S%H5795><s%> and unleavened cakes <S%H4682><s%> of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of meal. <S%H7058><s%> He put <S%H7760><s%> the meat <S%H1320><s%> in a basket <S%H5536><s%> and he put <S%H7760><s%> the broth <S%H4839><s%> in a pot, <S%H6517><s%> and brought it out <S%H3318><s%> to him under the oak, <S%H424><s%> and presented it. <S%H5066><s%>

The angel <S%H4397><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3947><s%> "Take the meat <S%H1320><s%> and the unleavened cakes, <S%H4682><s%> and lay <S%H3240><s%> them on this <S%H1975><s%> rock, <S%H5553><s%> and pour out <S%H8210><s%> the broth. <S%H4839><s%>" He did so. <S%H6213><s%>

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> stretched out <S%H7971><s%> the end <S%H7097><s%> of the staff <S%H4938><s%> that was in his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and touched <S%H5060><s%> the meat <S%H1320><s%> and the unleavened cakes; <S%H4682><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> out of the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and consumed <S%H398><s%> the meat <S%H1320><s%> and the unleavened cakes; <S%H4682><s%> and the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> departed <S%H1980><s%> out of his sight. <S%H5869><s%>

Gideon <S%H1439><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that he was the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh; <S%H3068><s%> and Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Alas, <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> Because <S%H3651><s%> I have seen <S%H7200><s%> the angel <S%H4397><s%> of Yahweh <S%H136><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face! <S%H6440><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H7965><s%> "Peace be to you! <S%H3372><s%> Don't be afraid. You shall not die. <S%H4191><s%>"

Then Gideon <S%H1439><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> there to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> it <S%H3068><s%> "Yahweh is Peace. <S%H3117><s%>" To this day it is still in Ophrah <S%H6084><s%> of the Abiezrites. <S%H33><s%>

It happened the same night, <S%H3915><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to him, <S%H3947><s%> "Take your father <S%H1><s%>'s <S%H6499><s%> bull, <S%H7794><s%> even the second <S%H8145><s%> bull <S%H7794><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> years old, <S%H8141><s%> and throw down <S%H2040><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Baal <S%H1168><s%> that your father <S%H1><s%> has, <S%H2040><s%> and cut down the Asherah that is by it; <S%H842><s%>

and build <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> to Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of this stronghold, <S%H4581><s%> in an orderly way, <S%H4634><s%> and take <S%H3947><s%> the second <S%H8145><s%> bull, <S%H6499><s%> and offer <S%H5927><s%> a burnt offering <S%H5927><s%> with the wood <S%H6086><s%> of the Asherah <S%H842><s%> which you shall cut down. <S%H3772><s%>"

Then Gideon <S%H1439><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> men <S%H582><s%> of his servants, <S%H5650><s%> and did <S%H6213><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> to him: <S%H3372><s%> and it happened, because he feared his father <S%H1><s%>'s household <S%H1004><s%> and the men <S%H582><s%> of the city, <S%H5892><s%> so that he could not do <S%H6213><s%> it by day, <S%H3119><s%> that he did <S%H6213><s%> it by night. <S%H3915><s%>

When the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> arose early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> behold, <S%H4196><s%> the altar of Baal <S%H1168><s%> was broken down, <S%H5422><s%> and the Asherah <S%H842><s%> was cut down <S%H5422><s%> that was by it, <S%H8145><s%> and the second bull <S%H6499><s%> was offered <S%H5927><s%> on the altar <S%H4196><s%> that was built. <S%H1129><s%>

They said <S%H559><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another, <S%H7453><s%> "Who has done <S%H6213><s%> this thing? <S%H1697><s%>" When they inquired <S%H1875><s%> and asked, <S%H1245><s%> they said, <S%H559><s%> "Gideon <S%H1439><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joash <S%H3101><s%> has done <S%H6213><s%> this thing. <S%H1697><s%>"

Then the men <S%H582><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joash, <S%H3101><s%> "Bring out <S%H3318><s%> your son, <S%H1121><s%> that he may die, <S%H4191><s%> because he has broken down <S%H5422><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Baal, <S%H1168><s%> and because he has cut down <S%H3772><s%> the Asherah that was by it. <S%H842><s%>"

Joash <S%H3101><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to all who stood <S%H5975><s%> against him, <S%H7378><s%> "Will you contend for Baal? <S%H1168><s%> Or will you save <S%H3467><s%> him? <S%H7378><s%> He who will contend for him, <S%H4191><s%> let him be put to death by morning. <S%H1242><s%> If he is a god, <S%H430><s%> let him contend <S%H7378><s%> for himself, <S%H5422><s%> because someone has broken down his altar. <S%H4196><s%>"

Therefore on that day <S%H3117><s%> he named <S%H7121><s%> him Jerub-Baal, <S%H3378><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Let Baal <S%H1168><s%> contend <S%H7378><s%> against him, <S%H5422><s%> because he has broken down his altar. <S%H4196><s%>"

Then all the Midianites <S%H4080><s%> and the Amalekites <S%H6002><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of the east <S%H6924><s%> assembled <S%H622><s%> themselves together; <S%H3162><s%> and they passed over, <S%H5674><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> in the valley <S%H6010><s%> of Jezreel. <S%H3157><s%>

But the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H3847><s%> on Gideon; <S%H1439><s%> and he blew <S%H8628><s%> a trumpet; <S%H7782><s%> and Abiezer <S%H44><s%> was gathered <S%H2199><s%> together after him. <S%H310><s%>

He sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> throughout all Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> and they also were gathered <S%H2199><s%> together after <S%H310><s%> him: <S%H7971><s%> and he sent messengers <S%H4397><s%> to Asher, <S%H836><s%> and to Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> and to Naphtali; <S%H5321><s%> and they came up <S%H5927><s%> to meet them. <S%H7125><s%>
Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> "If you will <S%H3426><s%> save <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by my hand, <S%H3027><s%> as you have spoken, <S%H1696><s%>

behold, <S%H3322><s%> I will put a fleece <S%H1492><s%> of wool <S%H6785><s%> on the threshing floor; <S%H1637><s%> if there is dew <S%H2919><s%> on the fleece <S%H1492><s%> only, <S%H2721><s%> and it is dry on all the ground, <S%H776><s%> then shall I know <S%H3045><s%> that you will save <S%H3467><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by my hand, <S%H3027><s%> as you have spoken. <S%H1696><s%>"

It was so; <S%H7925><s%> for he rose up early on the next day, <S%H4283><s%> and pressed <S%H2115><s%> the fleece <S%H1492><s%> together, <S%H2115><s%> and wrung <S%H4680><s%> the dew <S%H2919><s%> out of the fleece, <S%H1492><s%> a bowl <S%H5602><s%> full <S%H4393><s%> of water. <S%H4325><s%>

Gideon <S%H1439><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to God, <S%H430><s%> "Don't <S%H639><s%> let your anger be kindled <S%H2734><s%> against me, <S%H1696><s%> and I will speak but this once. <S%H6471><s%> Please let me make a trial <S%H5254><s%> just this once <S%H6471><s%> with the fleece. <S%H1492><s%> Let it now be dry <S%H2721><s%> only on the fleece, <S%H1492><s%> and on all the ground <S%H776><s%> let there be dew. <S%H2919><s%>"
God <S%H430><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so that night: <S%H3915><s%> for it was dry <S%H2721><s%> on the fleece <S%H1492><s%> only, <S%H2919><s%> and there was dew on all the ground. <S%H776><s%>
